en: Oregon Coast zone (international foot): Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant A) (Oregon_Coast_zone__international_foot_)
If using Hotine Oblique Mercator (variant B) method (code 9815), Ec=442071.300 ft, Nc=1211086.049 ft. See code 6769 for equivalent metric definition.
